# RECIPES - documentation of the recipes for each tradegood
# Determines how much demand for each tradegood is generated by industries, and what industries are impacted by shortages

alcohol = {
	grain = 1
	OR = {
		temperate_fruit = 1
		tropical_fruit = 1
		mediterranean_fruit = 1
		vegetables = 1
	}
	glass = 0.1
}

glass = {
	stone = 1
	coal = 1
}

# COTTAGE INDUSTRIES - the triggers for a province to have a natural cottage industry of manufactured goods
alcohol = {
	grain = 1
	vegetables = 1
	temperate_fruit = 2
	mediterranean_fruit = 3
}

glass = {
	stone = 1
	inorganic_compounds = 1
}
